en.title: FE's Indonesia Event 25th October 2008 (1).
en.content:
FE''s Achievers Recognition Dinner at Hailal International Club, Jakarta on 25th October 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with around 400 Members, Leaders and Invited Guests. There were many leaders from Malaysia and from Singapore attending, including PDs KC Phoon, Eliza Phoon, Rachel Thomas, Willy Toh and Tilly Kong. ED Rena Chong also attended with her Indonesian group together with Director Maggie Loo (Former Miss Malaysia).  A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL!

VIPs who attended include Badminton Legends Rudy Hartono and Susy Susanti (who is also FE Spokeswoman) with husband Allan Kusuma (Olympic Badminton Gold Medalist), Olympic Badminton Gold Medallists and FE Spokesmen Rexy Mainaky and Candra Wijaya and Ade Rai , FE Spokesman and Champion Body Builder. It is indeed a gathering of Indonesia's sports greats!

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Entertainment by Pink Entertainment Dancers and Singers.

- Welcome speeches by Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjaja and FE Founder Director KS Lee.

- Sharing and Demos by PD KC Phoon, including lifting of Olympic Badminton Medalist Allan Kusumu. These demos never fail to impress those who see them for the first time. Well done, KC!

- Sharing and Testimonials by FE's Spokesmen Rexy Mainaky, Candra Wijaya, Ade Rai and    Spokeswoman Susy Susanti. It is great to hear the positive personal experiences of using FE's QP    from these world champions!

- Sharing and Testimonial by 8 year old Sophia Anowar. The audience was truly touched by her    Quantum Pendant song, written by herself, based on her experiences of using FE's QP.

- Speech by FE Founder CEO, Paul Ting on "Building a Global Superbrand".  The audience was really    touched when viewing video clips of "Christmas For Payatas". These videos will be on YouTube
   soon for the world to see. FE is proud to champion a noble cause like this, to bring awareness to    the world and to help the needy children of the Smoky Mountains of Payatas, Philippines. 

- Installation of New Directors.

- Closing Speech by PD Rachel Thomas. FE's globetrotting grandmother, who flew in from Australia    where she is building new networks, was truly INSPIRATIONAL! It is not just about the money,    she says, it is about the BELIEVE and the COMPASSION that FE practices which can truly change    the lives of thousands of people, including needy children, in the countries where FE is in. Thank    you, Rachel!

- Lucky Draws.

A BIG Thank you to Country Licensee, Patrick Widjaja,  FE Leaders, Irene Mongkar, Joe Prabah and Anowar for organizing the Event and also to QP Wearer, well known TV Personality and Singer, Sandro Tobing for  MC 'ing the Event!
 
< Click Here For More Photos >

meta.description:
FE''s Achievers Recognition Dinner at Hailal International Club, Jakarta on 25th October 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with around 400 Members, Leaders and invited guests. There were many leaders from Malaysia and from Singapore attending, including PDs KC Phoon, Eliza Phoon, Rachel Thomas, Willy Toh and Tilly Kong. ED Rena Chong also attended with her Indonesian group together with Director Maggie Loo ( former Miss Malaysia). A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL!
VIPs who attended include Badminton Legends Rudy Hartono and Susy Susanti (who is also FE Spokeswoman) with husband Allan Kusuma ( Olympic Badminton Gold Medallist) , Olympic Badminton Gold Medallists and FE Spokesmen Rexy Mainaky and Candra Wijaya and Ade Rai , FE Spokesman and Champion Body Builder. It is indeed a gathering of Indonesia's sports greats!
Highlights of the Event include:
- Entertainment by Pink Entertainment dancers and singers.
- Welcome speeches by Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjaja and FE Founder Director KS Lee.
- Sharing and Demos by PD KC Phoon, including lifting of Olympic Badminton Gold Medallist Allan Kusumu. These demos never fail to impress those who sees them for the first time. Well done, KC!
- Sharing and Testimonials by FE's Spokemen Rexy Mainaky, Candra Wijaya, Ade Rai and Spokeswoman Susy Susanti. It is great to hear the positive personal experiences of using FE's QP from these world champions!
- Sharing and Testimonial by 8 year old Sophia Anowar. The audience was truly touched by her Quantum Pendant song, written by herself, based on her experiences of using FE's QP.
- Speech by FE Founder CEO, Paul Ting on "Building a Global Superbrand". The audience were really touched when viewing video clips of "Christmas For Payatas". These videos will be on YouTube soon for the world to see. FE is proud to champion a noble cause like this, to bring awareness to the world and to help the needy children of the Smoky Mountains of Payatas, Philippines.
- Installation of New Directors.
- Closing Speech by PD Rachel Thomas. FE's globetrotting grandmother, who flew in from Australia where she is building new networks, was truly INSPIRATIONAL! It is not just about the money, she says, it is about the BELIEVE and the COMPASSION that FE practises which can truly change the lives of thousands of people, including needy children, in the countries where FE is in. Thank you, Rachel !
- Lucky Draws
A BIG Thank you to Country Licensee, Patrick Widjaja, FE Leaders, Irene Mongkar, Joe Prabah and Anowar for organising the Event and also to QP Wearer, well known TV Personality and Singer, Sandro Tobing for MC 'ing the Event!
meta.author: klhunter
